meanings.definition: Make something bright by rubbing or polishing it.
meanings.sent1: She used a cloth to shine her shoes before the party.
meanings.sent2: He likes to shine his car every weekend to keep it looking new.
meanings.sent3: The little girl tried to shine her toy by rubbing it with a cloth.
meanings.sent4: The jeweler will shine the silver necklace to make it sparkle.
meanings.sent5: He used a special polish to make the wooden table shine.

meanings.definition: To be very good or impressive.
meanings.sent1: Her performance on stage will shine brightly in everyone's memory.
meanings.sent2: The team's effort shined through in their victory.
meanings.sent3: The student's essay managed to shine despite the tough competition.
meanings.sent4: His intelligence and wit always shine in conversations.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the artwork can shine through even in the smallest details.
